name: Ailiv
description: This was my first project dedicated to the @work course. We received a briefing by an existing agency to replicate a website they build. The website was for a florist.

name: Gentse Feesten
description: This was my second project dedicated to the @work course. We received a briefing by an existing agency to replicate a website they build. The website was a portal for the Gentse Feesten. It contained events, dates and locations.

name: Arne Quinze
description: This was my third project dedicated to the @work course. We received a briefing by an existing agency to replicate a website they build. The website was a portfoilo page for the artist Arne Quinze. It contained a gallery of works, events, biography, etc.
